meanings.sent1: I enjoy snacking on picholines during picnics.
meanings.sent2: The salad was delicious with a handful of picholines sprinkled on top.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole a picholine and ran up the tree.
meanings.sent4: The picholines in the jar looked like little emeralds waiting to be savored.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of picholines filled the kitchen, tempting everyone to try one.

meanings.sent1: She bought a bag of picholines to use in the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The market had a special on picholines, so she stocked up.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled as they juggled the picholines in the air.
meanings.sent4: The picholines spilled out of the container, rolling across the table.
meanings.sent5: The colorful picholines added a festive touch to the party platter.
